answers.answer: Dear Ntoorish,I would recommend that she seek the care of an eyeMD as well.  It might be possible that she has an ophthalmic migraine or another cause.Dr, FeklmanSandy T. Feldman, M.D., M.S.ClearView Eye and Laser Medical CenterSan Diego, California

question: Hi.  My 21 year old daughter has been playing video games since she was 12.  2 months ago she was watching her friends playing a video game and began to pass out/get very tired when she watched them do this.  She is fine when she is looking at the screen and playing herself.  After going to a M.D., she had an EEG done which came out normal.  Now, when she gets very angry, she sees a silver circle which at first the inside of the circle was black, and now she can see through it.  I have another appointment for her with the M.D. but wondered if this could be a sign of HBP or Diabetes?  Any ideas on if she should see an eye doctor instead of an M.D.?  Thank you for your help.
title: Seeing silver circles
